refnamediv.refname: How to design an elliptic filter
refnamediv.refpurpose: How to design an elliptic filter (analog and digital)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The goal is to design a simple analog and digital elliptic filter.

refsection.title: Designing an analog elliptic filter
refsection.para: There are several possibilities to design an elliptic lowpass filter. We can use analpf or zpell. We will use zpell to produce the poles and zeros of the filter. Once we have got these poles and zeros, we will have to translate this representation into a syslin one.
And then, the filter can be represented in bode plot.
Bode plot is only suited for analog filters.
If you want to design a highpass, bandpass or bandstop filter, you can first design a lowpass and then transform this lowpass filter using the trans function.
